tool_description: Retrieve the current time for a time zone, by name or location.
name: Current time by time zone
title: Current time by time zone

api_list.name: Retrieve current time
api_list.description: Retrieve the current time for a time zone, by name or location.

optional_parameters.name: timezone-addresslocality
optional_parameters.description: The name of a city for which the time zone should be looked up. Specifying the value for this key as 'help' will return a list of available address localities.

optional_parameters.name: timezone-alternatename
optional_parameters.description: An alias for the time zone.

optional_parameters.name: timezone-latitude
optional_parameters.description: The latitude of the time zone. Mutually inclusive with timezone.longitude.

optional_parameters.name: timezone-name
optional_parameters.description: The abbreviated name of the time zone. Specifying the value for this key as 'help' will return a list of available time zones.

optional_parameters.name: timezone-longitude
optional_parameters.description: The name of a city for which the time zone should be looked up. Specifying the value for this key as 'help' will return a list of available address localities.
